text.div:
Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition

Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.05.Hib"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.05.Hib

version: 0.1.0

name: IMMZ.DT.05.Hib

title: IMMZ.DT.05.Hib

status: draft

date: 2023-03-31 14:01:17+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: if child or person has not been vaccinated, give Hib vaccine between 6 weeks and 59 months

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT05

action

title: Immunize Patient for Hib - No Doses

description: Provide Hib immunizations – using the "Hib Vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Hib vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hib because no doses on 1 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" > 12text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hib because no doses on 1 dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.05.Hib.01

action

title: Immunize Patient for Hib - No Doses

description: Provide Hib immunizations – using the "Hib Vaccine immunization 3p schedule – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Hib vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hib because no doses on 3p dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Weeks" >= 6text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hib because no doses on 3p dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"In a country where the peak burden of severe Hib disease occurs in young infants" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hib because no doses on 3p dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.05.Hib.02

action

title: Immunize Patient for Hib - 1 Dose

description: Provide Hib immunizations – using the "Hib Vaccine immunization 3p schedule – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Hib vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hib because 1 dose on 3p dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last Hib dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hib because 1 dose on 3p dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"In a country where the peak burden of severe Hib disease occurs in young infants" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hib because 1 dose on 3p dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Age when patient received 1st dose" <= "12 months"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hib because 1 dose on 3p dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.05.Hib.03

action

title: Immunize Patient for Hib - 2 Doses

description: Provide Hib immunizations – using the "Hib Vaccine immunization 3p schedule – 2 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last Hib dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hib because 2 doses on 3p dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"In a country where the peak burden of severe Hib disease occurs in young infants" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hib because 2 doses on 3p dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.05.Hib.04

action

title: Immunize Patient for Hib - No Doses

description: Provide Hib immunizations – using the "Hib Vaccine immunization 3p + 1 schedule – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3p+1 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Hib vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hib because No dose on 3p+1 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Weeks" >= 6text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hib because No dose on 3p+1 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"In a setting where the greatest disease morbidity and mortality occur later, or where rate reductions of disease are not fully sustained after the routine use of Hib vaccine" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Hib because No dose on 3p+1 dose scheme
